Class ButtonHandleSMTP

java.lang.Object
metroMalaga.Controller.smtp.ButtonHandleSMTP
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class ButtonHandleSMTP extends Object implements ActionListener
ActionListener implementation for handling button events in the SMTP panel. Controls email sending, refreshing, attaching files, and other UI interactions.

      Checks if an email ID is currently pending an update.

      Returns:
      true if pending, false otherwise.
